title: 1945: the year that shaped our world
creator_credit: Therese Denny and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Documentary focusing on Europe and Britain after the end of World War II, showing the social and political changes that were in the air. The events of that years are reconstructed from film shot at the time.
title_for_label: 1945: the year that shaped our world
